name: AcTEC
0:
”Alexa, turn on the light”
”Alexa, turn off the light”
”Alexa, brighten the light to 20 percent”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
First, you need to purchase an AcTEC gateway, configure the AcTEC system device through the AcTEC APP, and associate the AcTEC system account through the Amazon Alexa APP. After the binding is completed, please voice "Alexa, discover device" to complete the device synchronization. Before using the Amazon speaker to control the AcTEC device, you need to wake up Alexa first.

For example:

Alexa，turn on living room <device name>

“Alexa, dim/brighten<device name> to 50% ”

“Alexa, change the kitchen to the color blue”
